text: Wendy Ager-Grant (born 2 July 1953) is a British fencer. She competed at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:British female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Great Britain Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Wendy Ager-Grant
